entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
